body.content:
Good day

I am Mrs Victoria Desmond, Manager of Bill and Exchange in (B.O.A),
Burkina Faso. I would like you to indicate your interest to receive
the transfer of (10.5 Million Dollars) in your bank account. This fund
belongs to a foreign costumer who died in plane crash with the next of
kin.

Thank you for your kind cooperation.

Yours sincerely
Mrs. Victoria Desmond
